import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import "../style/searchbox.css"; const SearchBox = ({ setTheme }) => { const { t } = useTranslation() const [, settheme] = useState("light") const isChangeTheme = (event) => { const value = event.target.value settheme(value) setTheme(value) } return (
